name: 伊格利亚战记/The Heroic Legend Of Eagarlnia
name_original: 伊格利亚战记/The Heroic Legend Of Eagarlnia
description:
Before time and matter, there was nothing here. Ella opened a door into the nothingness. But she was sad because it was desolate. And then she lay like a sleeping lady in the chaos,



After a long time, her body began to separate. The body created cornet, the god of order, and blood asknight, the god of chaos. Together they felt their mother's grief, and the combination of order and chaos created time



Between. This empty world began to turn, change, tear. A vast universe was born. At the center of this gorgeous new universe, the gods of order and chaos chose a planet that they turned into the most beautiful pearl of the universe, "eglia."
Eglia's world is made up of a large land mass in the northern hemisphere and some smaller ones. The land of the northern hemisphere is divided in two by the great mountain range, and the place in the east known as the "land of praise" is where all the stories begin.






This is a "grand strategy" game with an overhead background, developed using the Unity engine, and a combination of Japanese painting and pixel art style. The game takes the overhead world as the background, has designed several each has the characteristic country, the player may become any



The emperor of Italy, who rules his territory by giving orders on the map of the world, allows him to grow. At the same time, they can mobilize troops on the battlefield, recruit all kinds of military commanders and formulate strategies. Eventually, it will rule the country



The world is made up of 183 military commanders with their own stories, 55 different military styles and 51 urban areas.
